sentence_zh_TW: 這些新鮮的葡萄是一個健康的小吃選擇，適合孩子們。
sentence: These fresh ______ are a healthy snack option for the kids.

sentence_zh_TW: 他不小心向後摔倒了，這讓他感到很尷尬。
sentence: He accidentally fell ______, which left him feeling quite embarrassed.

sentence_zh_TW: 她確實是一位優秀的演講者，能夠輕鬆吸引觀眾的注意。
sentence: She is ______ an excellent speaker, able to effortlessly engage her audience.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個位置是每個工作尋求者的理想選擇，因為它提供了靈活的工作時間。
sentence: This position is the ______ choice for every job seeker as it offers flexible working hours.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次的科學實驗中，我們將從每個區域收集幾個樣本以進行分析。
sentence: In this scientific experiment, we will collect several ______ from each area for analysis.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了克服困難的挑戰，小女孩展現出了巨大的勇氣，面對她的恐懼。
sentence: To overcome the difficult challenges, the little girl showed great ______ in facing her fears.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位年輕的園丁每天都在花園裡工作，以確保植物們能夠茁壯成長。
sentence: The young ______ works in the garden every day to ensure the plants thrive.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位著名的音樂家在音樂界中享有盛譽，他的作品一直深受大家喜愛。
sentence: The renowned ______ is celebrated in the music world, and his works are beloved by many.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位神父在教堂裡提供指導與支持，幫助信徒克服生活中的挑戰。
sentence: The ______ offers guidance and support in the church, helping the congregation overcome life's challenges.

sentence_zh_TW: 每晚睡覺前，我都會確保我的床單乾淨且整潔，這樣才能有一個好的睡眠。
sentence: Every night before bed, I make sure my ______ is clean and tidy to have a good night’s sleep.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位守護者負責照顧並保護專案中的所有資料，確保一切安全無虞。
sentence: The ______ is responsible for taking care of and protecting all the data in the project, ensuring everything is safe and sound.

sentence_zh_TW: 我非常感謝你為我所做的一切，這將永遠留在我心中。
sentence: I truly ______ everything you have done for me; it will forever stay in my heart.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果我們能夠翻倍我們的努力，我相信我們可以在今年內達成目標。
sentence: If we can ______ our efforts, I believe we can achieve our goals within this year.

sentence_zh_TW: 在使用電腦時，保持良好的姿勢對於保護螢幕的視覺效果非常重要。
sentence: Maintaining a good posture while using the computer is very important for protecting the visual quality of the ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 人類有五種基本的感覺，這些感覺幫助我們理解周圍的世界。
sentence: Humans have five basic ______ that help us comprehend the world around us.

sentence_zh_TW: 在建築這座新大廈時，我們需要使用質量優良的材料以確保其穩固。
sentence: In constructing this new building, we need to use high-quality ______ to ensure its stability.

sentence_zh_TW: 對於這門課程來說，掌握基本知識是取得成功的關鍵，無論是理論還是實踐。
sentence: Mastering the ______ is crucial for success in this course, whether in theory or practice.

sentence_zh_TW: 在旅遊時，了解各國的邊界規範是確保安全和順利通行的重要步驟。
sentence: While traveling, understanding the ______ regulations of different countries is an important step to ensure safety and smooth passage.

sentence_zh_TW: 在城市中，警察的主要職責是保護市民和維持秩序。
sentence: In the city, the main duty of a ______ is to protect citizens and maintain order.

sentence_zh_TW: 小孩在黑暗的房間裡感到害怕，所以他們需要一個燈來驅散黑暗。
sentence: The children felt ______ in the dark room, so they needed a light to chase away the darkness.
